title: Why can't i upvote threads from NA anymore??
body:
I was upvoting a thread made by an NA user, but when i did, it asked first to log in (i was already logged in). I managed to relog in as requested, but it just won't let me do it. It keeps saying that i wrote the captch wrong (when actually i did that correctly). Any help please? Thank You in advance. 

Edit: it now asks me to log in whenever i vote, regardless of the region.

replies.body: Weird. I upvoted this thread no problem. Can you upvote comments? Your region is showing EUW as usual?
it still does the same thing when i upvoted your comment =(
Are you able to vote on EUW content without this issue?  What happens when you clear your cookies and relog on the website?
i tried to upvote the comment below (from EUW). It still asks me to log in..
Sorry to hear that this is happening for you, which browser and operating system are you using?

Any updates? Still working on this? I'm still having this issue and it's effectively banning me from the boards given the importance of votes. Quite sad, I do really like these boards over the normal forums.
me too. i've event deleted the cache, as a rioter said a few days ago. i'm truly hoping to fix to come up.
Yea, things are sitll buggy...most of the times reloading the page should be sufficient to enable upvoting again.
i've reloaded the page lots of times! =(

sometimes it accidentaly switches the region to NA...maybe check if it´s correct on EUW?

If realoading doesn´t help and the region is correct usually relogging fixes the issue for some time.
impossible, my account is bound to the EUW region, if You were right, i couldn't even reply =)

I have the same problem.

When I can comment but not upvote, I can see myself as logged in on the top bar and the region's OK, but the square with notifications etc doesn't appear. I used to be able to fix it by reloading, but not anymore.

Same issue here, tried logging out/in again, tried in a private session, no use, can't upvote any posts when I'm in a thread. I can however from a board (where you see all the threads listed), which is really weird. I do regularly have to switch back to EUW from NA, but this has been so for longer than the upvote issue. (Every time I try to vote I get prompted to log in while I am clearly logged in, how else would I post this)

Using Firefox/Windows 7
